actions.script: hitLabelList = [] hitLabels = hit.each { key, value -> if (key != "runningTimeMillis") hitLabelList.add(key + "=\"" + (value ? (value.toString().replace('\\', '\\\\').replace('"', '\\"') + "\"") : "\"")) } hitLabels = hitLabelList.join(",") hitRunningTime = hit.runningTimeMillis as String
